label: 鍋島直正
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: なべしま なおまさ
説明文: (1814-71). Also: Kanso. Tazama daimyo (Hizen, or Saga; 357,000 koku; 1830-61). Patron of technological innovation. Supporter of kobu-gattai, but held aloof from political disputes before 1868. Senior posts in early Meiji government; councillor (Gijo).
